```py
from microbit import display
import time

for i in range(3):
    display.show(i)
    time.sleep(1)
```

```py
>>> from microbit import display, Image
>>> import time
>>> 
>>> display.show(Image.HAPPY)
```

```py
>>> CLOCK = [getattr(Image, 'CLOCK%s' % i) for i in range(1, 13)]
>>> for image in CLOCK:
...     display.show(image)
...     time.sleep(0.1)
...     
...     
... 
>>>
```

```py
from microbit import display, Image
import time

CLOCK = [getattr(Image, 'CLOCK%s' % i) for i in range(1, 13)]
while True:
    for image in CLOCK:
        display.show(image)
        time.sleep(0.1)
```

```py
from microbit import display

TEXT = [
    ('slow', 300),
    ('normal', 150),
    ('fast', 75),

]

for text, delay in TEXT:
    display.scroll(text, delay=delay)
```

```py
>>> from microbit import display, button_a, button_b
>>> 
>>> button_a.is_pressed()
False
```

```py
>>> from microbit import display, button_a
>>> import time
>>> 
>>> NUMBERS = list(range(9, 0, -1))
```

```py
>>> def countdown():
...     for i in NUMBERS:
...         display.show(i)
...         time.sleep(1)
...     display.clear()
...     
...     
... 
>>> 
>>> countdown()
```
